description.raw:
Redo of pull request #1656 with a fix for 2.83 in cdbe461.

Bullet 2.83 was [recently released](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/releases/tag/2.83). It has new features and also API changes. This pull request includes:

* Fix for an API change that prevents BulletHinge2Joint.cc from compiling successfully
* Use new `btHingeAccumulatedAngleConstraint` which provides wrapped angles for hinge joint (#1074). Note that joint limits larger than one revolution are not yet support.
* Also a minor change to simbody search logic that is required to build against simbody master branch.

This should do no harm to systems using bullet 2.82, but fix compilation and partially address #1074 for systems using bullet 2.83.

* [no-gpu build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/191/) is clean
* [trusty nvidia build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/144/) is clean

title: Support bullet 2.83
